question: Who has been appointed as the secretary (West) in the Ministry of External Affairs?
explanation: Senior diplomat Vikas Swarup is appointed as the Secretary (West) in the Ministry of External Affairs. The Appointments Committee (ACC) of the Cabinet has approved the appointment. Swarup is a 1986 batch Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officer. As the Secretary (West), he will be responsible for India\'s affairs with the UK and other European nations.
